name: finbuckle.multitenant
description: Finbuckle.MultiTenant is a .NET Standard library for multitenant support designed for ASP.NET Core 2. It provides functionality for tenant resolution, per-tenant app configuration, and per-tenant data isolation.

standard-version.postbump: echo $(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g')
